description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement to purchase two (2) Mowers and ancillary items, including training (if applicable).",
duration_in_months: This bid selection process does not expire until 2024-01-31
full_summary:
## Tender Notice ^[Tendance de prévention]
### Reference ^[Appel d'offre]

* Reference number: CB-8579-44518719
* Solicitation number: 01B46-23-110

### Contract Details ^[Détails du contrat]

* Tender closing date: 2023-09-14T14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2023-09-15
* Expected contract end date: 2023-03-31
* Procurement method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection criteria: Lowest price
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of opportunity: Canada
* Regions of delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Bidder Information ^[Informations du soumissionnaire]

* Contracting entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Contracting entity address: 2001 Robert-Bourassa Boulevard, Montréal, QC H3A 3N2, Canada
* Contact person: Marie-Pier Parent
	+ Email: marie-pier.parent@agr.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 1-506-531-7263

### Tender Description ^[Description de l'appel d'offres]

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking to purchase a front mower with necessary ancillary items. Interested suppliers must have a Supply Arrangement (SA) under E60HS-18MOWR/B. The contract will be awarded to the lowest bidder. All inquiries should be directed to the contact person.

**Attachments**
* Tender notice: French attachment [apm.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8579/apm.pdf)
* Tender notice: English attachment [npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8579/npp.pdf)

**Note**: The tender closing date is past the notice publication date, indicating that this tender opportunity is no longer available.
